LanguageData.AF_Gun_AGBs41_Revise.label: <color=#97ddfa>AGBs-IceFox</color>
LanguageData.AF_Gun_AGBs41_Revise.description:
AGBs41，IceFox，It's one of the favorite Sydaily crystal weapons of the Ferian: Elegant design, small and lightweight at the same time to ensure that the effective killing of alien monsters！ 

The modified Sydaily crystal weapon! It restores its range, power, and fire limit as opposed to the adventure version. 
But the Sydaily Blade and the built-in Sydaily Crystal Computer are already available.
